references.paper_title: Enhanced deep residual networks for single image super-resolution
references.reason: This paper is a foundational work in deep learning-based single image super-resolution (SR), introducing the Enhanced Deep Residual Networks (EDSR) architecture which significantly improved the performance of SR models.

references.paper_title: Toward real-world single image super-resolution: A new benchmark and a new model
references.reason: This paper introduced a new benchmark dataset and a new model, which significantly advanced research in real-world SR by focusing on more challenging and realistic datasets.

references.paper_title: Masked autoencoders are scalable vision learners
references.reason: This paper introduced the Masked Autoencoder (MAE) framework, a self-supervised learning approach that significantly improved the performance of visual representation learning models and was later adapted for super-resolution tasks.

references.paper_title: Unsupervised real-world image super resolution via domain-distance aware training
references.reason: This paper made significant contributions to domain adaptation methods for SR, focusing on unsupervised methods to address the domain gap between synthetic training data and real-world test images.

references.paper_title: Image super-resolution using deep convolutional networks
references.reason: This paper is a pioneering work in applying deep convolutional neural networks (CNNs) for image super-resolution, laying the groundwork for many subsequent research efforts in the field.
